Name: select_feature_f
Description: Binary decision to include Feature f in the upcoming release.

Name: select_user_story_us
Description: Binary decision to include User Story us in the next sprint.

Name: assign_task_to_sprint
Description: Binary assignment of Task t to the active Sprint backlog.

Name: prioritize_user_story_us
Description: Integer priority rank assigned to a selected User Story.

Name: allocate_team_capacity_hours
Description: Continuous hours of capacity allocated to the sprint.

Name: set_story_points_us
Description: Integer story points assigned to a User Story.

Name: set_task_effort_t
Description: Integer effort units assigned to a Task.

Name: schedule_review_duration
Description: Integer minutes allocated for Sprint Review duration.

Name: limit_board_wip
Description: Integer limit of simultaneous cards allowed on the Scrum Board.

Name: select_release_plan_rep
Description: Binary decision to activate a specific Release Plan.

Name: choose_deployment_target
Description: Categorical selection of deployment target for Development Snapshot.

Name: set_sprint_goal_achievement_target
Description: Integer target indicator for achievement_of_goal proxy (0/1).

Name: assign_product_owner_availability
Description: Integer percentage availability reserved for backlog activities.
